description: Security related information of a form field.

allowSameOrigin.description: Allows the iframe content to be treated as being from the same origin.

fullscreen.description: Specifies the permissions policy set for the fullscreen directive.

geolocation.description: Specifies the permissions policy set for the geolocation directive.

camera.description: Specifies the permissions policy set for the camera directive.

microphone.description: Specifies the permissions policy set for the microphone directive.

allowTopNavigation.description: Allows the iframe content to navigate its top-level browsing context.
